Outlook Add-in

Add to Teams Meeting

This add-in creates a Microsoft Teams meeting and drops it into the current Outlook calendar invite. The primary experience lives inside Outlook, with a focused task pane and lightweight dialogs for the flow.

If you are browsing this site directly, use the quick links below to open the add-in surfaces for validation or demo.

Open the task pane Commands UI Create event dialog Auth dialog

How it works

Launch the add-in from Outlook, connect your account, and create a Teams link that populates the meeting body automatically.

Why this page exists

Azure Static Web Apps requires a default document. This page doubles as a public landing and a handy jump-off for add-in testing.

Need help?

If something looks off, open the task pane link first. The add-in should still be launched and used from Outlook.
